cause.description:
insert a wine corc to lock every anus with toxic gas in Norway and also make them stop eating potatos or hotdogs as they become very obese and fat and the consequences are smelly toxic farting wich leads to global warming and smelly air. please do not donate to Norway as they will only use the money to buy more hotdogs and enlarge their anus. if you hear or smell any farting please contact us on anti fart hotline and we will deal with the situation Thanks.

cause.name: Global worming is caused by toxic fart gas from Norwegiens smelly exit holes
